channel.title: Blog of The Scooter Girl
channel.description: You could have gone to Facebook or twiiter. But you came here instead. Good for you.

item.title: Welcome to ze blog
item.dc:creator: Scooter Girl
item.description: Hello, let's see if this shows up - if it did, hello newcomer. You are just going to deal with my learning how to set a site other than WordPress. Check back, it will be worth it. Promise.
